definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

sentences.english: Now many major employers are beginning to demand more than the completion of school.
sentences.chinese: 現在許多大僱主開始要求糹完成學業更多的東西了。

definition: Kangxi radical 105, known as 登字頭|登字头[deng1 zi4 tou2]
stripes of a tiger/"tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
"cover" or "conceal" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 23)/see also 匚[fang1]
to walk (side part of split character)
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "eo" or "sya"), an ancient Korean writing system
"long stride" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 54), occurring in 建, 延, 廷 etc
Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
